description: Development only - write to the console.

params.name: origin
description: 3D position of text to be drawn.

params.name: text
description: The text to draw on the screen.

params.name: color
description: RGB color of the line in a vector, defaults to white.

params.name: alpha
description: Alpha value of the text (how transparent), defaults to 1.

params.name: scale
description: Size scale of the text, defaults to 1.

params.name: duration
description: How many server frames the text should persist through.
